page.title: 13RECREATION-R.N.A.S.CULDROSE
page.content: All people who work at Culdrose have a pass to use sports facilities on the base for themselves and their families.Sometimes other people can get permission to use the facilities as well. There is a large swimming pool and sports hall which is in constant use by Culdrose and by schools and other outside clubs. There is a childrens Judo club on Fridays with adult sessions on Tuesdays. Other sports played are Badminton, Basketball,Tennis,Football and Netball.There are Squash courts and also a Sauna at the swimming pool. Culdrose also have a Gliding Club which has 7 gliders at present and uses the old radar room as their clubhouse.The gliders are towed by a Chipmunk two seater plane.
